text: hi guys, im trying to implement a method where i take successive derivatives of a function, and expose it as a new method. my input vector is ~ 5 element, and each function outputs a scalar. however when taking successive gradients, its slowing down significantly. Currently im using ForwardDiff, but if its better to use a different library for something like this, i would like to know!

text:
if people are interested in more details, here is how the function goes.

I start with a function h(x), h: R^5 -> R

and now I compute the lie derivative of h along a flow f: R^5 -> R^5, ie

hdot(x) = grad(h, x)' * f(x)

this works brilliantly

the problem is when i take successive iterations of this - essentially to find higher time derivatives.
